alerts.media_type_unknown: The media type for this stream is unknown!

information.stream_missing_information: This stream doesn't have all information needed to proceed for the stream analysis. Please give us more information in the Media Information.
information.stream_analyzed_information: We already analyzed this stream. If the results didn't match your expectation, try to change the Media Settings and try again.
information.media_type_unknown: By marking this stream as unknown, it will not be analyzed.

error.pcap-upload-message: An error occurred during the %{name} file upload process

errors.stream-marked-as-unknown: The Media Type for this stream was configured as "Unknown". To get more information about this stream change the Media Type in the stream configuration.
